channel.title: Help please..Max stat level 100 instead of 99 :(
channel.description:
Hi all my max stat level's are 100 and it is annoying because i'm trying to make an exact replica of 317 Runescape... Could anybody please tell me how to change this and i will give credit's when i release the source... Please help
The stats are like this exept instead of saying different numbers they all say 100
[img]http://i33.photobucket.com/albums/d64/familyguy1956/runescape2.jpg[/img]
Thankyou for your time... && i hope you can help me

item.title: Help please..Max stat level 100 instead of 99 :(
item.dc:creator: @Mellor Mellor
item.description:
@Mellor wrote:

Ah oky doke, its alright for you to give people advice but not use it yourself, bit hypocritical isnt it? Especially seeing as you dont actually know if the people have searched google or not
